error.message: Call to deprecated function pager_query_add_page(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Pager\PagerManagerInterface::getUpdatedParameters() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to link_header_pager.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
